title: Fairy Tail, Vol. 10
description: SHADOWS OF THE PAST Erza Scarlet is the most kick-butt woman wizard in Fairy Tail, but in the past this indomitable fighter was . . . a slave? Now she finds out that her old companions have completed the evil device they were forced to build while held in the Tower of Heaven. What’s more, their wicked master requires a Erza! Includes special extras after the story!
author: Hiro Mashima
